title: Bug 3733'close project' not available in the package view (1GEHFLT)
description: AK (5/29/01 12:05:55 PM)should the 'close project' action be available also in the package view?NOTES:EG (5/29/01 5:31:26 PM)not for JuneEG (7/12/01 2:23:28 PM)this requires JavaModel support so that closed projects show up in the UI.Otherwise closing a project makes it disappear.
SR: Bug 3733'close project' not available in the package view (1GEHFLT)
